description.value:
Can aid in identifying a Profane Artifact, explain the origins and beliefs of a heretical cult, or the true history of some otherwise censored item. Treat as having +30 in relevent Forbidden Lore Skills (The Warp, Daemonology, Heresy, Cults or Psykers, etc,)

Requirements

An individual well versed in forbidden knowledge concerning the warp, daemons, and other profane concepts. Anyone from a Mad Hermit to a cloistered noble scholar.

Effect: Rare

Notes: -
